BookTypeId = #{booktypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update tb_book set BookTypeId = #{booktypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BookName = #{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BookPress = #{bookpress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BookAuthor = #{bookauthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BookTanslor = #{booktanslor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BookPrice = #{bookprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BookPages = #{bookpages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BookOutline = #{bookoutline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BookDealmount = #{bookdealmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BookLookmount = #{booklookmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BookStoremount = #{bookstoremount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where BookId = #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

from tb_book where BookName like '%${BookName}%'

from tb_book where BookName like '%${BookName}%' order by BookDealmount desc

from tb_book where BookName like '%${BookName}%' order by BookDealmount asc
